original_text: You may not offer the Passover sacrifice within any of your towns that the Lord your God is giving you,
korean_text: 유월절 제사를 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 각 성에서 드리지 말고

sentences.original_text: You may not offer the Passover sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 유월절 제물을 드릴 수 없다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is giving you
